input.sentences: i was trying to figure out which train i need to take to get to the party .
it took me all day but i eventually figured it out and arrived on time .
there were a lot of pictures being taken .
there was a lot of good food prepared for us .
output.sentences: I wound up taking the train to the party.
Once I got there, every one was waiting and happy to see me.
I took a lot of silly pictures.
I left with a full tummy, there was so much delicious food!
